src_original: jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi apriyasaṃprayogo 'pi priyaviprayogo 'pi duḥkham /  yadapi icchan paryeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkham /
yo 'syā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ punarbhavikyā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstatratatrābhinandinyā janikāyā nirvartikāyā aśeṣo virāgo nirodhaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ
